# index(after:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the position in the sequence of the joint that follows the given position.

## Declaration

```swift
func index(after i: JointTransforms.Index) -> JointTransforms.Index
```

## Discussion

For more on calculating indices, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/Array/index(after:)].

## Accessing joint transforms

- **subscript(_:)**: Accesses a single joint transform in the collection at the given index.
- **index(before:)**: Returns the position in the sequence of the joint that preceeds the given position.
